entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10 except minus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10 except minus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
